title: Amid backlash, Twitter changes NPR’s account to ‘government funded media’
description: Amid backlash, Twitter changes NPR’s account to ‘government funded media’.

title: Doomsday to utopia: Meet AI’s rival factions
description: Inside Silicon Valley’s insular AI sector, a small group of strange but influential subcultures have clashed in recent months.

title: The man who unleashed AI on an unsuspecting Silicon Valley
description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman took the artificial intelligence company from nonprofit to kingmaker. Not everyone is happy with him.
